mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY S.RANK_SCORE DESC) AS RANK_ORDER, U.USER_NICKNAME, U.USER_PROFILE_IMG, S.RANK_NUM, S.RANK_SCORE, ROUND((COUNT(CASE WHEN GR.GAME_RECORD IN (1, 2, 3, 4) THEN 1 END) * 100.0) / COUNT(GR.GAME_RECORD), 1) AS RECORD_PERCENTAGE FROM TB_USER U JOIN TB_SEASON S ON U.USER_NUM = S.USER_NUM LEFT JOIN TB_GAME_RECORD GR ON U.USER_NUM = GR.USER_NUM WHERE S.SEASON_NAME = '2023-2' GROUP BY U.USER_NICKNAME, U.USER_PROFILE_IMG, S.RANK_NUM, S.RANK_SCORE ORDER BY S.RANK_SCORE DESC;
